Nightshift does as instructed.  He works the keyboard with his paw digits b=
ut quickly transforms to get better hand dexterity.

" I'm on it now sir, t=
hanks for the code.  Oh yeah, Computer, suspend all control on Cheetors ID,=
 till further notice.  I suspect he's been altered against his will."

Don'=
t be envious of what you don't have, be grateful for things you already pos=
ses.  Nothing is worth more than family and friends.

On Jan 16, 2012, at 6=
:39 PM, Super Cyclonus <supercyclonus@...> wrote:

Sweet, that was close. Okay let's see.. Computer, can you register me as
> =

ion code."

ode received and verified" The computer responded. "Subject
> Nightshift en=
tered as registered operator."
> 
> "Good." LORD ELDER said. "Now bring the=
 satellite around to begin a
> through scan of the jungle. Perhaps we can p=
ick up something."
